pdfset:
<#if statements?has_content><#list statements as statement>



	
  	
  
  	
  	<#assign logoInfo>https://5554661-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=9544&c=5554661_SB1&h=3c1a74753ea9e8671a1c</#assign>
  	<#assign regInfo>Company Registration No: 07479524.  Registered Office: 3 Finsbury Avenue, 5th Floor, London, EC2M 2PA, United Kingdom.</#assign>
	<#assign emailInfo>accounts@onfido.com</#assign>
	<#assign telInfo>02081333628</#assign>
	<#assign vatInfo>VAT No: GB 159 2397 76</#assign>
  	<#assign signature>https://5554661-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=37336&c=5554661_SB1&h=d5b58d1ec190b9507c62</#assign>
      
      
   	
  	<#if subsidiary.id == "10"> 
      <#assign emailInfo>billing@onfido.com</#assign>
    </#if>
  
  	<#if subsidiary.id == "15"> 
    </#if>
  
  	<#if subsidiary.id == "6"> 
    </#if>
  
  	<#if subsidiary.id == "8"> 
    </#if>
  
  	<#if subsidiary.id == "5"> 
    </#if>
  
  	<#if subsidiary.id == "9"> 
    </#if>
  
  

  
    
        
			
    			

					STATEMENT
					 
                  	
    			
          	
          
			
        		

        			${statement.billaddress}
        			 
        			Statement Date
        			${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}
${vatInfo}
billing@onfido.com
        		
        		

        			 
        			${statement.trandate?string.long}
        		
        		

        			 
        			Amount Due
        		        		
        		

        			 
        			${statement.amountDue}
        		        		
              	

        			 
        			Currency
        		
        		

        			 
        			${statement.currency}
        		
              	

        			 
        			 
        		
              	

        			 
        			 
        			 
        			 
        			 
        		
          	
        

        
			
          		

                  	${regInfo}
					Page  of 
				
        	
        
    

    


  <#if statement.lines?has_content>
    
        <#list statement.lines as line>
            <#if line_index==0>
              
                  

                  ${line.datecol@label}
                  ${line.description@label}
                  Invoice
                  ${line.payment@label}
                  ${line.balance@label}
                  
              
            </#if>
              

                ${line.datecol}
                ${line.description}
                ${line.charge}
                ${line.payment}
                ${line.balance}
              
        </#list>
    

    
        

          ${statement.aging1@label}
          ${statement.aging2@label}
          ${statement.aging3@label}
          ${statement.aging4@label}
          ${statement.aging5@label}
          ${statement.agingbal@label}
        
        

          ${statement.aging1}
          ${statement.aging2}
          ${statement.aging3}
          ${statement.aging4}
          ${statement.aging5}
          ${statement.agingbal}
        
    
  </#if>


</#list>
<#else>






Please use Single Currency Advanced Printing Template


</#if>
